chunk="to-navigation" is not supported in DITA 2.0. Replace the attribute value.
Il faut un attribut outputclass (par exemple, ajoutez outputclass="language-javascript").
The scale attribute is mandatory for <@NAME> elements (hint: as default, add scale="80").
The source file linked to does not exist. Check the related folder for a missing file and make sure the file name is correct.

PARAM2.
<@NAME> elements will no longer support the alt attribute in DITA 2.0. Replace the alt attribute with an <alt> sub-element.

href="@HREF" links to an unsupported file format (only *.jpg, *.jpeg or *.png are allowed).
The image file linked to does not exist. Check the graphics folder for a missing file and make sure the link and file name specified are correct.
Found <@NAME product="PARAM1">. Add this element to includes.dita and use a conref to reference it.
The <@NAME> element will no longer be supported in DITA 2.0. Delete the element.
The <@NAME> element will no longer support collection-type="tree" in DITA 2.0. Replace the value.
The <@NAME> element will no longer support collection-type="tree" in DITA 2.0. Replace the value.

Found only <li product="PARAM1"> elements in <@PARENT>. This results in an empty <@PARENT> for other variants. Either add additional product attributes for the missing variants or mark the list up as <@PARENT product="PARAM1">
The <@NAME> element will no longer support the type attribute in DITA 2.0. Use the scope and format attributes instead.
<@NAME> elements will no longer support the title attribute in DITA 2.0. Replace the title attribute with an <title> sub-element
Pour <@NAME> elements, an href attribute is mandatory.
<@NAME> elements will no longer support the keyref attribute in DITA 2.0. Delete the attribute.

<@NAME> elements will no longer support the print attribute in DITA 2.0. Replace the print attribute with a deliveryTarget attribute and a appropriate value.
